protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-101651
protocol.text: 50-100 Arabidopsis thaliana seeds were vapor sterilized overnight. At 8 A.M., seeds were imbibed on plates containing ½ LS media with 0.8% agar at pH 5.8. Seeds were stratified for 3 days at 4°C and at 8 A.M. on the fourth day they were released into short day conditions of 8 hours light (100 µmol/m2s) and 16 hours dark at 22°C. After seven days of growth, plants were harvested starting at the dark to light transition of the eighth day.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-101652
protocol.text: Collected tissue was immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen in 2 ml eppindorph tubes with three steel ball bearings and stored at -80°C. Frozen tissue was disrupted on a Retsch shaker under liquid nitrogen. RNA was extracted using QIAGEN RNAeasy kits with on column DNAase treatment and resuspended in 35 µl RNAase-free H2O.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-101654
protocol.text: Seedlings (50-100) from individual plates were collected every four hours.
